Hi

We have a development team built up a Data Access Layer API  in Java,
mimic of the EntityManager in EJB3. I am in a seperate QA team and
testing it.

After communicating with the development team, we agreed that my job
is to verify the object model described in UML diagram is correctly
implemented(we run Strum here with no detailed spec docs).

So basically, what I need to do is to exercise the object graph
through the EntityManager(to make sure I can do CRUD kind of
operations). I can see development team has done quite some unit
testings covered almost the while object graph. I don't really want to
repeat their work.

What are the areas shall I focus on? It seems a very basic question of
testing. Please give me some hints.

Jirong
